text: Logo! Allah Taalaa ney tumhen mitti say phir nutfa peda kiya hai phir tumhen joray joray (mard-o-aurat) banadiya hai aurton ka hamila hona aur bachon ka tawallud hona sab uss kay ilm say hi hai aur jo bari umar wala umar diya jaye aur jiss kissi ki umar ghatay woh sab kitab mein likha hua hai. Allah Taalaa per yeh baat bilkul aasan hai
